meta.title: Form Rating
meta.description: BootstrapVue custom ratings form control or ratings display

props.description: Rating value. This is the v-model
The number of stars to show. Minimum value is 3, default is 5
Applies one of the Bootstrap theme color variants to the component
CSS color to use instead of variant. Acceptts either a hex or rgb/rgab string
When `true` shows the current rating value in the control
When `true` renders as an inlin element rather than a blick (100% width) element
setermines the number of digita after the decimal to show. Defaults to do defined precision
When `true` makes the rating readonly. When `true`, fractional ratings values are allowed (half icons will be shown)
Bootstrap Icon name to use for the empty icon. Note icon must be registered in your component or globally
Bootstrap Icon name to use for the half icon. Note icon must be registered in your component or globally
Bootstrap Icon name to use for the full icon. Note icon must be registered in your component or globally
